xwikidoc.content: {pre} #** * Service to create or update a SavedExport list *# #set($defaultspace = "SavedList") #set($defaultpagename = "List") #set($class = "XWiki.SavedListClass") ## if the page parameter is available then we are updating a SavedExport list $response.setContentType("text/xml") #if($request.page) #set($savedexport = $xwiki.getDocument($request.page)) #set($ok = $savedexport.setTitle($!request.title)) #set($ok = $savedexport.use($savedexport.getObject($class, true))) #set($ok = $savedexport.set("list", $request.list)) #set($ok = $savedexport.save()) <result>$savedexport.fullName</result> #else #set($pagename = $xwiki.getUniquePageName($defaultspace, $defaultpagename)) #set($savedexport = $xwiki.getDocument("${defaultspace}.${pagename}")) #set($ok = $savedexport.setTitle($!request.title)) #set($ok = $savedexport.use($savedexport.getObject($class, true))) #set($ok = $savedexport.set("list", $request.list)) #set($ok = $savedexport.save()) <result>$xwiki.collection.escapeForXML($savedexport.fullName)</result> #end {/pre}
